long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Selection Search for Netflix extension allows you to search for any selected (highlighted) text or phrase from a webpage with just a right-click(from right click menu). You no longer need to manually copy and paste the text into Netflix search bar to look for movie or TV show information.

With this extension, you don't have to copy movie name then open netflix website and paste in search bar. Simply save time by highlighting text and right cliking and opening Netflix with relevant search results. It's that simple. It works seamlessly with Netflix.

Features:

✔️Quick and easy access to Netflix!
✔️Multiple language support.
✔️Intuitive user interface.
✔️Lightweight and fast.

Whether you're doing research on a movie, want to watch your favorite TV show, the Selection Search for Netflix extension is a must-have tool. Save time and effort with this convenient search extension for Chrome.

This extension also packs a custom Google web search which will help you in researching about movies of your choice. Moreover this search is way better than other search engines in general. 

How to Use
1) You fist have to highlight/select the movie or TV show name appearing on any webpage.
2) Now, right click on the highlighted text and a context-menu will appear.
3) You will see an option with netflix icon stating this, Search Netflix for "your selected text".
4) Click on this option.
5) Now this this text picked up from chrome context menu will be searched on netflix and will return relevant result.

To provide this functionality extension takes over your default search for seamless experience.
